Key Match Events: Pakistan won by 7 wickets (with 15 balls remaining)

Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted that Pakistan needed a win to stay alive in the tournament after their defeat against India.
Canada showed impressive composure by bouncing back to outplay Ireland.
Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan were expected to do the heavy-lifting for Pakistan.
Nicholas Kirton was highlighted as a key player for Canada due to his recent performances.
Post-Match Reflections: Azhar Mahmood emphasized that Pakistan players should not be complacent despite their losses.
Aaron Johnson believed that the New York pitch leveled the playing field for Canada.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A fresh pitch was expected to be used for the Canada-Pakistan clash.
Rain delayed the start of the India-Pakistan clash in New York, but no weather interruptions were expected for the Canada-Pakistan match.
